entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
